About Me

Let me tell you a few things

About Myself:

My name is Jordan, I'm 25 years old and have a deep passion for web development. My enthusiasm for web development includes, all things front-end including (HTML5, CSS3, jQuery, JavaScript, Sass, React.js … and so much more!). I graduated from SUNY Oswego with a bachelor’s degree in marketing. While attending college I played collegiate lacrosse and also happened to be a contracted cadet in the Army ROTC Program. I've now served over 5 years for the US Army obtaining life skills such as problem solving, teamwork, communication and responsibility.

United States Army Officer

Position: Platoon Leader
Rank: First Lieutenant

Transportation officer responsible for mentoring and empowering Non-Commissioned Officers. Directly liable for the morale, health, and training of 67 Soldiers. Responsible for the maintenance, accountability, and effective utilization of all platoon vehicles, weapons, and associated equipment worth over $25,000,000. Plans, manages, and monitors platoon operations, to include troop and equipment transport in tactical and non-tactical convoys.

Collegate Athlete

NCAA Division II / III
Men's Lacrosse

My NCAA athletic experience built transferable skills of; communication, time management, self-motivation, detail-oriented, analytical/strategy applications, being goal-oriented, and the ability to take criticism were practiced in a live laboratory throughout my NCAA lacrosse career. More importantly I grew as a leader, where I learned how my strengths can bring out and enrich leadership and production in others.

Application Software Developer

Centene Corporation

Designed, built, tested and maintained scalable and stable custom built technology solutions to meet business needs. Acted as a subject matter expert for Application Software developers and Engineers. Contributed to the entire implementation process including driving the definition of improvements based on business need and architectural improvements. Consistently met with business partners to understand business needs. Took responsibility for the overall design of the solution Design, build and test applications. Consistently conducted root cause analysis and advanced performance tuning for complex business processes and functionality
